flawed_nl_solution:

So it takes 20+10=<<20+10=33>>33 minutes
They are filming 5*4=<<5*4=20>>20 episodes
So it takes 20*33=<<20*33=660>>660 minutes
This is equivalent to 660 / 60 = <<660/60=11>>11 hours
